actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to limit the authority of local educational agencies to use Federal funds received under title I for construction of a school facility to cases in which no reusable closed public school facility is within three miles of the proposed school facility.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to limit the authority of local educational agencies to use specified Federal funds for construction of a school facility if a reusable (at 50 percent or less of the project cost) closed public school facility is within three miles of the proposed school facility.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to limit the authority of local educational agencies to use Federal funds received under title I for construction of a school facility to cases in which no reusable closed public school facility is within three miles of the proposed school facility.
